<includeonly>
<tr>
  <th scope="row">{{{label|}}}</th>
  <td style="--size: {{{size|0}}};">{{{value|}}}</td>
</tr>
</includeonly><noinclude>
== Template:ChartsCss row ==
Helper for `Template:ChartsCss column`.

=== Parameters ===
* `label`: row label
* `size`: raw CSS value for `--size` (e.g. `0.4` or `calc(40 / 100)`)
* `value`: cell content (text or HTML like `<br/>`)
</noinclude>
